Package entity

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
entity.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents an internship position offered by a company. Contains details about the internship including position requirements, dates, status, and manages applications from students. Each internship has a limited number of slots and can be opened or closed based on its status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String internshipID, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String companyName, String repInCharge, int numSlots)
      Constructs a new Internship with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier for the internship
      title - the title of the internship position
      description - the description of the internship
      level - the difficulty level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      preferredMajor - the preferred major for candidates
      openingDate - the date when applications open
      closingDate - the date when applications close
      companyName - the name of the company
      repInCharge - the ID of the company representative
      numSlots - the number of available slots

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if all available slots for this internship have been filled.
      Returns:
      true if the internship is full, false otherwise

    • canApply

      public boolean canApply(LocalDate currentDate)
      Checks if a student can apply for this internship on the given date. The internship must be visible, approved, still accepting applications, and have available slots.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the date to check applicability for
      Returns:
      true if the internship is open for applications, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the internship with key information.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing internship ID, title, level, company, and status
